title: Project-Based Learning with Microteaching and Peer Assessment to Strengthen Remote Education Teachers’ Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program for corporate training managers to develop teacher-role competencies required in remote education. Participants engage in project-based activities via BYOD

learning_goals: Participants can apply ≥3 technology integration strategies required for remote education design.
Through microteaching activities, participants enhance their ability to design and deliver lessons aligned with peer evaluation criteria.
In project-based assessments, participants demonstrate ≥80% proficiency in performing teacher roles (management, interaction, assessment, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
